VENDOR SERVICE AGREEMENT

This Service Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of January 1, 2024.

PARTIES:
- Client: 0711 Intelligence GmbH, Munich, Germany
- Vendor: Example Services GmbH, Berlin, Germany

1. SERVICES
Vendor agrees to provide software consulting services as described in Statement of Work.

2. TERM
This Agreement shall commence on January 1, 2024 and continue for 12 months.

3. COMPENSATION
Client agrees to pay Vendor EUR 5,000 per month for services rendered.
Payment terms: Net 30 days from invoice date.

4. CONFIDENTIALITY
Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of proprietary information.

5. TERMINATION
Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

6. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement shall be governed by German law.

7. DATA PROTECTION
Vendor agrees to comply with GDPR and German data protection laws.

SIGNATURES:
Client: _________________    Date: January 1, 2024
Vendor: _________________    Date: January 1, 2024
